oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic farming for Syria: option or necessity?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Santucci, Fabio Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The document stresses the need for an holistic approach to introduce and expand organic agriculture into Syria.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Santucci, Fabio Maria (2008) Organic farming for Syria: option or necessity? Speech at: The contribution of agriculture to economic reforms in Syria, Damascus - Syria, July 1-2, 2008.
